title: Dr. David Bilstrom, Autoimmune Functional Medicine MD on LinkedIn: #nursepractitioners #functionalmedicine #nursepractitionerlife
description: For the last 20 years, I have provided Functional Medicine support for reversing and preventing autoimmune and chronic disease using the traditional insurance...
cleaned_text: For the last 20 years, I have provided Functional Medicine support for reversing and preventing autoimmune and chronic disease using the traditional insurance model. It's possible and I can show you how! I believe NPs who integrate Functional Medicine into their families and practices, can be the game changer for healthcare. It's not easy practicing medicine the traditional way and it's not easy staying chronic disease-free using traditional medicine. Functional Medicine keeps you and your family healthy and strong, so you can be your best at helping your patients do the same. Functional Medicine is the pathway to creating a holistic patient-centered practice, checkout my free masterclass to learn how. Link to masterclass in comments below. This free masterclass gives you protocols you can implement immediately for patients and family members of all
